channel.title: Miguel Alejandro de la Rocha
channel.description: Online Portfolio and Home of Miguel Alejandro de la Rocha for projects and presentations.

item.title: Residential Life (2016 - Present) Residential / Peer Advisor at University of Texas - Dallas
item.description:
Supervised and served as mentor and advisor for a floor of 24 residents by leading through experience in academic, professional and personal matters. \
Managed various administrative duties including maintenance requests, indicent reports and customer service in front desk office. \
Utilized organizational and public speaking skills to create and implement social events for the Residence Hall.

item.title: ASICA (Summer 2017) Information Technology and Databases Intern
item.description:
Interned at ASICA International in the Projects Division for Database Applications. \
Developed a client application for a Credit Union to support accounting and human resources processes through Oracle Application Express and PL/SQL. \
Designed and implemented a team project tracking tool to keep control of current tasks and goals.

item.title: ZETA Designs (2017 - Present) Chief Technology Officer
item.description:
Co-Founded ZETA Designs to develop web platforms for Honduran enterprises and businesses with professional and responsive frameworks. \
Reached out and took control of building a client base through networking and professional communication. \
Built and maintained the framework of operations and distribution of services for present and future clients. \
Check our website to see our online portfolio and services.
